DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare two different range energy flux density Extracorporeal Shock Wave Therapy treatment supraspinatus calcify tendonitis .
DOC.brief_title: Extracorporeal Shock-wave Therapy Supraspinatus Calcifying Tendonitis : Randomized Clinical Trial Comparing Two Different Energy Levels
DOC.criteria: visible clinical benefit previous conservative treatment medium large calcific deposit , accord Bosworth classiﬁcation type I II Gartner deposit presence tiny calcific deposit , accord Bosworth classiﬁcation type III , accord Gartner classification age ( less 18 year old ) , diabetes , coagulation disease anticoagulant therapy , tumor , bone infection , previous shoulder surgery , pregnancy , pacemaker , acute bursitis demonstrate ultrasound imaging , rheumatoid arthritis connective tissue disease
